feed.title: Gravity Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.18.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.18.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.18.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.18.1

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump docker/build-push-action from 6.9.0 to 6.10.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1333
  • build(deps): bump prettier from 3.3.3 to 3.4.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1332
  • build(deps): bump rollup from 4.27.4 to 4.28.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1338
  • build(deps): bump globals from 15.12.0 to 15.13.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1340
  • build(deps): bump eslint from 9.15.0 to 9.16.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1337
  • build(deps): bump chart.js from 4.4.6 to 4.4.7 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1339
  • build(deps): bump github.com/quic-go/quic-go from 0.48.1 to 0.48.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1341
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1342
  • build(deps): bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.4.0 to 1.5.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1343
  • build(deps): bump github.com/getsentry/sentry-go from 0.29.1 to 0.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1344
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.29.0 to 0.30.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1347
  • build(deps): bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.5.0 to 1.5.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1346
  • build(deps): bump prettier from 3.4.1 to 3.4.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1345
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.31.0 to 0.32.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1348
  • build(deps): bump @trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports from 4.3.0 to 5.0.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1351
  • build(deps): bump github.com/swaggest/rest from 0.2.69 to 0.2.70 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1354
  • build(deps): bump @trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports from 5.0.1 to 5.1.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1352
  • build(deps): bump rollup from 4.28.0 to 4.28.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1353
  • build(deps): bump @trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports from 5.1.0 to 5.2.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1358
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1356
  • build(deps): bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.5.1 to 1.6.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1357

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.19.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.19.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.19.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.19.0

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump github.com/minio/minio-go/v7 from 7.0.81 to 7.0.82 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1367
  • build(deps): bump eslint from 9.16.0 to 9.17.0 in /web in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1363
  • build(deps): bump @rollup/plugin-commonjs from 28.0.1 to 28.0.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1364
  • build(deps): bump @rollup/plugin-node-resolve from 15.3.0 to 16.0.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1366
  • build(deps): bump @rollup/plugin-typescript from 12.1.1 to 12.1.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1365
  • build(deps): bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.35.2 to 1.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1370
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1368
  • build(deps): bump globals from 15.13.0 to 15.14.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1373
  • build(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1372
  • Patternfly v6 by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1374
  • fix some tests not running by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1378
  • API: OIDC token auth by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1375

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.18.4...v0.19.0

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.19.1
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.19.1

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.19.1

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.19.1

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump library/node from 23.4 to 23.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1382
  • build(deps): bump esbuild from 0.24.0 to 0.24.2 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1380
  • build(deps): bump rollup from 4.28.1 to 4.29.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1381
  • DNS: fix SOA by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1384
  • build(deps): bump github.com/gosimple/slug from 1.14.0 to 1.15.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1387
  • build(deps): bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.36.0 to 1.36.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1388
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1386

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.19.0...v0.19.1

entry.title: New release for Gravity: Release 0.20.0
entry.content:
Upgrade to this version of gravity by using this container image:

ghcr.io/beryju/gravity:v0.20.0

Upgrade to the current JS API Client using

npm i gravity-api@0.20.0

Upgrade to the current Golang API Client using

go get beryju.io/gravity@v0.20.0

What's Changed

  • build(deps): bump @codecov/rollup-plugin from 1.6.0 to 1.7.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1391
  • build(deps): bump the eslint group in /web with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1390
  • build(deps): bump yaml from 2.6.1 to 2.7.0 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1392
  • build(deps): bump @trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports from 5.2.0 to 5.2.1 in /web by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1395
  • build(deps): bump github.com/getsentry/sentry-go from 0.30.0 to 0.31.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1394
  • ci(build): add labels to docker images by @tigattack in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1393
  • web: fix dns zone wizard icon by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1396
  • dns: fix CNAME answer, mixed-case queries and more by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1397
  • dns: don't send nxdomain if we've found a zone by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1398
  • ci: set build hash to release when tagged by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1399
  • web: dont flash ui when not logged in by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1400
  • web: Revert "Patternfly v6 (#1374)" by @BeryJu in https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/pull/1401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BeryJu/gravity/compare/v0.19.1...v0.20.0
